author: Paulo Gatchalian
comment: One of the most useful apps to have on your wrist! Take the time to create your own recipes and you will see the beauty of this app. Love that you can even use your own images, as graphics on the watch make more sense than tiny walls of text. Hope development continues. This app will benefit immensely from partnering up with popular sites like instructables, pinterest, etsy and the like for sharing recipes. Reserving a star for more features, material design, and app/website integrations!

author: Tim McClure
comment: I couldn't use it with my gear s3 because it said that it needed one or more services installed that were mot available.

reply.author: w9 software
reply.content: I'm sorry for the confusion. This version is for Android Wear only. For Gear S3 you should use the version from Galaxy App Store (phone app is installed automatically when you are installing the watch app).

author: Noctos B
comment: I've purchased the version from the samsung store but i can't install the formulas on my watch. I've emailed you about it to no reply. I have to give a 1 star for that unfortunately.

author: Justin Gao
comment: very good 非常好，很有创意，用户可以选择安装不同的功能

author: floyd bruno
comment: I purchased the app via the Samsung Store and I am unable to install the formulas on my Gear S3.  I have written to the makers but they have not replied to me.  Will be complaining to Samsung and will ask for a refund.  Don't get this app if you have a Gear phone, it doesn't work
